FuncDef: This command configures Network Basic Input/Output System (NetBIOS) name server IP addresses.

ParaDef.Info: The IP address of the NetBIOS name server. This address must be unique within the subnet and specified in dotted decimal notation. Allowed values are IP addresses in the range 1.0.0.0 to 223.255.255.255 (with support of /31 subnets). Up to 4 IP addresses maximum.
